comment: Show the commutative law for an operation ` O ` on a toy structure class ` C ` of commuatitive operations on ` CC ` . This illustrates how a structure class can be partially specialized. In practice, we would ordinarily define a new constant such as "CAbel" in place of ` C ` . (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
